remarks: Transitivity of the less-than relationship.  Proposition 5.8 of [Schwabhauser] p. 42.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 27-Jun-2019.)
statement:
legval.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
legval.d $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
legval.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
legval.l $e |- .<_ = ( leG ` G ) $.
legval.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
legid.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
legid.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. P ) $.
legtrd.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. P ) $.
legtrd.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. P ) $.
legtrd.e $e |- ( ph -> E e. P ) $.
legtrd.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. P ) $.
legtrd.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( A .- B ) .<_ ( C .- D ) ) $.
legtrd.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( C .- D ) .<_ ( E .- F ) ) $.
legtrd $p |- ( ph -> ( A .- B ) .<_ ( E .- F ) ) $.
